privacy_policy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy_policy.section_1_content: This privacy policy describes how we collect, use, store and protect your personal data when you use our event management platform. We are committed to protecting your privacy and complying with applicable regulations, including the General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR).
privacy_policy.section_2_content: We collect the following types of data:
privacy_policy.section_2_item_1: Identification information: name, first name, email address, phone number
privacy_policy.section_2_item_3: Participation data: events you register for, attendance, check-ins
privacy_policy.section_2_item_4: Technical data: IP address, browser type, pages viewed, visit duration
privacy_policy.section_2_item_5: Communication data: exchanges with our support, notification preferences
privacy_policy.section_3_content: Your personal data is used to:
privacy_policy.section_3_item_1: Manage your registration and participation in events
privacy_policy.section_3_item_2: Send you confirmations, reminders and important information about events
privacy_policy.section_3_item_3: Improve our services and personalize your experience
privacy_policy.section_3_item_4: Generate anonymized statistics on event attendance
privacy_policy.section_3_item_5: Comply with our legal and regulatory obligations
privacy_policy.section_3_item_6: Inform you of our future events (with your explicit consent)
privacy_policy.section_4_content: The processing of your personal data is based on:
privacy_policy.section_4_item_3_text: improvement of our services, platform security
privacy_policy.section_4_item_4_text: retention of tax and accounting data
privacy_policy.section_5_content: We never sell your personal data. Your data may be shared with:
privacy_policy.section_5_item_1: The organizers of events you attend
privacy_policy.section_5_item_2: Our service providers (hosting, emailing, analytics) under confidentiality agreements
privacy_policy.section_5_item_3: The competent authorities in case of legal obligation
privacy_policy.section_6_content: Your personal data is retained for the period necessary for the purposes for which it was collected:
privacy_policy.section_6_item_2_text: 10 years in accordance with legal obligations
privacy_policy.section_7_content: In accordance with GDPR, you have the following rights:
privacy_policy.section_7_item_1_text: obtain a copy of your personal data
privacy_policy.section_7_item_2_text: correct your inaccurate or incomplete data
privacy_policy.section_7_item_3_text: delete your data under certain conditions
privacy_policy.section_7_item_4_text: restrict the processing of your data
privacy_policy.section_7_item_5_text: receive your data in a structured format
privacy_policy.section_7_item_6_text: object to the processing of your data
privacy_policy.section_7_item_7_text: at any time, without affecting the lawfulness of prior processing
privacy_policy.section_7_footer: To exercise these rights, contact us at:
privacy_policy.section_8_content: We implement appropriate technical and organizational measures to protect your personal data against unauthorized access, loss, destruction or alteration. These measures include data encryption, secure authentication, regular backups and staff training.
privacy_policy.section_9_content: Our platform uses cookies to improve your user experience, analyze traffic and personalize content. You can manage your cookie preferences in your browser settings. Some cookies are essential for the platform to function.
privacy_policy.section_10_content: We reserve the right to modify this privacy policy at any time. Changes will be published on this page with a new update date. We encourage you to regularly check this page to stay informed of our data protection practices.
privacy_policy.section_11_content: For any questions regarding this privacy policy or the processing of your personal data, you can contact us:
privacy_policy.section_11_footer: You also have the right to file a complaint with the relevant data protection authority if you believe your rights are not being respected.
